statements: SELECT * FROM underwriting_process;
SELECT applicant_id, income, approved_policy FROM underwriting_process WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_process WHERE credit_score >= 700;
SELECT applicant_id, age, income FROM underwriting_process WHERE approved_policy = true;
SELECT applicant_id, income, credit_score FROM underwriting_process WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM underwriting_process WHERE age > 30 AND income > 50000 ORDER BY credit_score DESC
SELECT * FROM underwriting_process WHERE credit_score >= 700 AND approved_policy = TRUE ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT applicant_id, age, income FROM underwriting_process WHERE income < 40000 AND credit_score < 600
SELECT * FROM underwriting_process ORDER BY age ASC, credit_score DESC, income ASC
SELECT avg(income) as avg_income, max(credit_score) as max_credit FROM underwriting_process WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT * FROM policy_information;
SELECT policy_id, applicant_name FROM policy_information WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_status FROM policy_information WHERE policy_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT policy_id, income FROM risk_factors WHERE health_condition = 'Excellent';
SELECT * FROM policy_information WHERE policy_type='Life' AND policy_status='Active';
SELECT policy_id, applicant_name FROM policy_information WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT policy_id, applicant_name, policy_type, policy_status FROM policy_information WHERE policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM risk_factors WHERE credit_score > 700);
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE income > 50000 AND health_condition='Excellent';

SELECT policy_id, policy_type, COUNT(*) AS risk_factors_count FROM policy_information INNER JOIN risk_factors ON policy_information.policy_id = risk_factors.policy_id GROUP BY policy_id, policy_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors;
SELECT factor_name, weight FROM risk_factors ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT factor_name, weight FROM risk_factors WHERE weight > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM policy_applications WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM policy_applications ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_factors WHERE weight > 0.5;
SELECT factor_name, weight FROM risk_factors ORDER BY factor_name ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM policy_applications WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT * FROM policy_eligibility WHERE eligibility_status = TRUE;

SELECT applicant_name, policy_type, factor_name FROM policy_applications JOIN policy_eligibility ON policy_applications.application_id = policy_eligibility.application_id JOIN risk_factors ON policy_eligibility.factor_id = risk_factors.factor_id;
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors;
SELECT id, age, credit_score FROM RiskFactors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, policy_type FROM PolicyEligibility WHERE is_eligible = TRUE;
SELECT id, name FROM CustomerData ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, policy_id, start_date FROM PolicyHistory WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RiskFactors WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY credit_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, email FROM CustomerData WHERE name LIKE '%John%' OR address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT PolicyEligibility.customer_id, PolicyEligibility.policy_type, CustomerData.name FROM PolicyEligibility JOIN CustomerData ON PolicyEligibility.customer_id = CustomerData.id WHERE PolicyEligibility.is_eligible = TRUE ORDER BY CustomerData.name;

SELECT CustomerData.name, CustomerData.email, PolicyHistory.start_date, PolicyHistory.end_date FROM CustomerData LEFT JOIN PolicyHistory ON CustomerData.id = PolicyHistory.customer_id ORDER BY PolicyHistory.start_date DESC;
SELECT p.policy_id, p.start_date, p.end_date, r.income FROM PolicyHistory p JOIN RiskFactors r ON p.customer_id = r.id WHERE r.credit_score > 700 ORDER BY p.end_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM applicants;
SELECT id, name, age FROM applicants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, coverage_amount FROM policies ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT risk_id, factor_name, weight FROM risk_factors WHERE weight < 3.5 ORDER BY factor_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_id, policy_id, application_date FROM policy_applications WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM applicants ORDER BY age DESC, income ASC;
SELECT name, occupation, income FROM applicants WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT policy_name, coverage_amount, premium_amount FROM policies WHERE deductible < 500 ORDER BY coverage_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_applications WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY application_date DESC;

SELECT a.name AS applicant_name, p.policy_name, u.approval_status FROM applicants a JOIN policy_applications pa ON a.id = pa.applicant_id JOIN policies p ON pa.policy_id = p.policy_id JOIN underwriting_results u ON pa.application_id = u.application_id WHERE u.approval_status = 'approved' ORDER BY a.name ASC, p.policy_name DESC;
